content:
[
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-003-002-001",
    "action": "The lighthouse beam flickers erratically as Elias adjusts the lens mechanism, his hands trembling slightly from exhaustion and growing unease",
    "intention": "Establish the failing equipment and Elias's deteriorating state",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 1,
    "information_revealed": ["The lighthouse equipment is becoming increasingly unreliable", "Elias is physically and mentally strained"],
    "information_withheld": ["The true cause of the equipment failures", "Whether the manifestations are connected to the lighthouse itself"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-003-002-002",
    "action": "A low, resonant hum emanates from the walls themselves, causing the metal framework to vibrate and tools to rattle on their hooks",
    "intention": "Introduce supernatural manifestation that affects the physical environment",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 1,
    "information_revealed": ["The supernatural presence can affect solid matter", "The manifestations are intensifying"],
    "information_withheld": ["The source of the humming", "Whether the lighthouse structure is compromised"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-003-002-003",
    "action": "The lighthouse beam suddenly cuts out completely, plunging the surrounding waters into darkness as Elias frantically works the manual controls",
    "intention": "Create immediate crisis requiring Elias's attention",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 1,
    "information_revealed": ["The lighthouse has suffered complete power failure", "Ships at sea are now in immediate danger"],
    "information_withheld": ["Whether this is equipment failure or supernatural interference", "How long the outage will last"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-003-002-004",
    "action": "While struggling with the controls, Elias hears distinct footsteps ascending the spiral staircase below, slow and deliberate, though he knows he is alone",
    "intention": "Present supernatural manifestation that demands investigation",
    "pivot": true,
    "tension_delta": 1,
    "information_revealed": ["The supernatural presence can mimic human sounds", "Something is actively approaching Elias's position"],
    "information_withheld": ["What is creating the footsteps", "Whether it poses a direct threat"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-003-002-005",
    "action": "Elias freezes at the controls, torn between his duty to restore the light and his desperate need to investigate the approaching presence",
    "intention": "Establish the central conflict and force character choice",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 0,
    "information_revealed": ["Elias faces an impossible choice between two urgent needs", "His sense of duty conflicts with his survival instincts"],
    "information_withheld": ["Which choice he will make", "The consequences of either decision"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-003-002-006",
    "action": "The footsteps stop directly below the lamp room, and an unnatural silence falls over the lighthouse as even the ocean wind seems to hold its breath",
    "intention": "Heighten tension through ominous pause before revelation",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 1,
    "information_revealed": ["The presence has reached a critical proximity", "The supernatural force can affect natural elements"],
    "information_withheld": ["What the presence intends", "Why it has stopped at that specific location"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-003-002-007",
    "action": "Elias makes his choice, abandoning the controls to grab a heavy wrench and move toward the staircase, his breathing shallow with fear",
    "intention": "Show character decision and commitment to action despite fear",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 1,
    "information_revealed": ["Elias chooses investigation over duty", "He arms himself, expecting potential danger"],
    "information_withheld": ["What he will find below", "Whether the lighthouse will remain dark"]
  }
]
